snippet: The president’s campaign advisers plan to paint Mitt Romney as a protector of Wall Street who is out of touch with the middle class and as a flip-flopper.
abstract: Pres Obama's campaign advisers, emboldened by Mitt Romney's razor-thin victory at the Iowa caucuses, continue to expand media campaign intended to paint him as a flip-flopper and a protector of Wall Street who is out of touch with the middle class.

byline.original: By HELENE COOPER and MARK LANDLER

lead_paragraph: The president’s campaign advisers plan to paint Mitt Romney as a protector of Wall Street who is out of touch with the middle class and as a flip-flopper.

headline.seo: Obama Campaign Focuses Its Attacks on Romney
headline.main: After Iowa, Obama Campaign Sharpens 2 Negative Portrayals of Romney
headline.print_headline: After Iowa, Obama Campaign Sharpens 2 Negative Portrayals of Romney
